attributes.additional_details: Reckognise what these nurses have done for this country, they have been there every day, risked their lives, left  their families, these nurses are hero's and deserve to be treated better by the government. Most businesses have been paid to sit at home, these poor nurses have worked througout the pandemic and deserve to be treated better.  the government should hang their heads in shame. Please Thank these nurses and give them a pay rise they deserve
attributes.background: Change the decision on the pay rise for the nurses, these nurses have worked endlessley for this country. Nurses have given their all , they have risked their lives, some have lost lives, left their homes and their children.They have worked unconditionally and deserve treating better.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
